name: ComplianceContract

methods.name: get_emission_rule
methods.desc: Returns the rules defined by the regulator for the given emission SC

methods.name: set_emission_rule
methods.desc: Sets the rules defined by the regulator for the given emission

methods.name: is_business_compliant
methods.desc: Returns true/false based on whether the business is compliant to the emissions value or not

methods.name: issue_compliance_nft
methods.desc: Creates the compliance NFT for the business via the Algorand SC

desc:
Compliance Contract for storing business' compliance analysis on chain
    and creating/minting NFTs for businesses based on the rules defined by the regulators.
